constituent: armpit, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, triceps, power, muscle, arnold, power3, muscle3, arnold3
heisigStory: Part of the body . . . muscles (three of which give us "triceps" or "muscles on top of muscles"). You will want to keep the kanji distinct from the one that follows by paying attention to the positioning of the elements.
koohiiStory1: What part of the body has a very, very, very powerful smell? The armpit, of course!
koohiiStory2: (no important on yomi) The part of Conan´s body that is three times more effective at defeating foes than his muscles are his stinky ARMPITs. [Note: Typically, when the flesh primitive is on the left side it refers to a body part - this helps distinguish in from threaten (#871)].
myStory: hông, bên cạnh, mép, phía bên. chữ Hiếp. bộ phận nhận ba lực.
